publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-324# Brian Adam: Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence—That the Parliament supports the setting up of a centre of excellence for the oil and gas industry in the North East of Scotland.
S1M-324# Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence (lodged on 24 November 1999) Mr Mike Rumbles*, Nora Radcliffe*, Richard Lochhead*

S1M-324# Brian Adam: Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence—That the Parliament supports the setting up of a centre of excellence for the oil and gas industry in the North East of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Nora Radcliffe, Richard Lochhead
S1M-324# Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence (lodged on 24 November 1999) Alasdair Morgan*

S1M-324# Brian Adam: Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence—That the Parliament supports the setting up of a centre of excellence for the oil and gas industry in the North East of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Nora Radcliffe, Richard Lochhead, Alasdair Morgan
S1M-324# Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence (lodged on 24 November 1999) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-324# Brian Adam: Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence—That the Parliament supports the setting up of a centre of excellence for the oil and gas industry in the North East of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Nora Radcliffe, Richard Lochhead, Alasdair Morgan, Mr David Davidson
S1M-324# Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence (lodged on 24 November 1999) Shona Robison*
S1M-324# Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence (lodged on 24 November 1999) Alex Neil*
S1M-324# Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence (lodged on 24 November 1999) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-324# Brian Adam: Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence—That the Parliament supports the setting up of a centre of excellence for the oil and gas industry in the North East of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Nora Radcliffe, Richard Lochhead, Alasdair Morgan, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie

S1M-324# Brian Adam: Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence—That the Parliament supports the setting up of a centre of excellence for the oil and gas industry in the North East of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Nora Radcliffe, Richard Lochhead, Alasdair Morgan, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie
S1M-324# Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence (lodged on 24 November 1999) Michael Russell*

S1M-324# Brian Adam: Oil and Gas Centre of Excellence—That the Parliament supports the setting up of a centre of excellence for the oil and gas industry in the North East of Scotland. Supported by: Mr Mike Rumbles, Nora Radcliffe, Richard Lochhead, Alasdair Morgan, Mr David Davidson, Shona Robison, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell
